name: Snapshots of the Planar
description:
*** Fix of objkt #168098 for safari/iOS ***

"Snapshots of the Planar" is an eternal, generative audio work. It is completely synthesized in the viewer's browser. 

"Snapshots" is an experiment with using Zequencer (a web-based audio sequencer) in the context of H=N.

The project can be found (and remixed) here: https://zequencer.io/create/QmaQStc5PEBtbX8UxNr7qmRExqcFoaAVL9kcqkiPZth3kD

Further Notes: Each circle is mapped to a parameter in the synthesizer and the mouse can guide them.
